amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 8102 regarding prohibition of funds to transfer any individual detained at Guantanamo Bay to the custody or control of the individual's country of origin, or any other foreign country.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 8102 regarding prohibiting funds to transfer any individual detained at GTMO to the custody or control of the individual's country of origin, or any other foreign country.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A029) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 251 (Roll no. 338).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A029) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 251 (Roll no. 338).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A029) offered by Mr. Nadler.
